content: finished circumference is about 22 gauge 6dc & 4 row = 2 in double_crochet materials i hook worsted weight yarn tapestry needle hat round 1 10dc in magic_ring slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet made 10 double_crochet round 2 ch2 double_crochet in same st 2dc in each st around join 20 double_crochet round 3 ch2 2dc in next st *double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st repeat from* join 30 double_crochet round 4 ch2 double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st *double_crochet in next 2 sts 2dc in next st repeat from* join 40 double_crochet round 5 ch2 double_crochet in next 2 sts 2dc in next st *double_crochet in next 3 sts 2dc in next st repeat from* join 50 double_crochet round 6 ch2 double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 double_crochet in next st *double_crochet in next 4 sts 2dc in next st repeat from* join 60 double_crochet round 7-16 ch2 double_crochet in every st join fasten_off 60 double_crochet left ear flap flip the hat inside out look for the join and count 9 sts left from there slip_stitch in 9th st from join round 1 ch1 single_crochet in next 11 sts ch1 turn 12 single_crochet round 2 decrease single_crochet in next 8 sts decrease ch1 turn 10 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in every st ch1 turn 10 single_crochet round 4 decrease single_crochet in next 6 sts decrease ch1 turn 8 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet in every st ch1 turn 8 single_crochet round 6 decrease single_crochet in next 4 sts decrease ch1 turn 6 single_crochet round 7 single_crochet in every st ch1 turn 6 single_crochet round 8 decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts decrease ch1 turn 4 single_crochet round 9 single_crochet in every st ch1 turn 4 single_crochet round 10 decrease twice fasten_off 2 single_crochet right ear flap count 21 sts right of the join slip_stitch in 21st st from join round 1 ch1 single_crochet in next 11 sts ch1 turn 12 single_crochet round 2 decrease single_crochet in next 8 sts decrease ch1 turn 10 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in every st ch1 turn 10 single_crochet round 4 decrease single_crochet in next 6 sts decrease ch1 turn 8 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet in every st ch1 turn 8 single_crochet round 6 decrease single_crochet in next 4 sts decrease ch1 turn 6 single_crochet round 7 single_crochet in every st ch1 turn 6 single_crochet round 8 decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts decrease ch1 turn 4 single_crochet round 9 single_crochet in every st ch1 turn 4 single_crochet round 10 decrease twice chain 1 half_double_crochet in every st 2hdc in each of the 2 sts on the tips of each ear flap tassels cut 6 pieces of yarn about 16 long thread 3 pieces through one of the sts at the tip of the ear flap and braid it to desired length knot it at the end and repeat to the other ear flap ☺ ☺ hope you enjoy this pattern
